metadata.title: CVE-2015-4479 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in libstagefright in Mozilla Firefox before 40.0and Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.2 allow remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted saio chunk in MPEG-4 video data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 40.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 40.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 40.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 40.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '40.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
